briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Famciclovir 1-day Treatment Compared to 3-day Treatment With Valacyclovir in Adults With Recurrent Genital Herpes
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind Study to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Patient-initiated Famciclovir 1000 mg b.i.d. x 1 Day to Valacyclovir 500 mg b.i.d. x 3 Days in Immunocompetent Adults With Recurrent Genital Herpes
summary: This study will assess the safety and efficacy of one-day famciclovir (1000 mg twice a day (b.i.d)) in reducing the duration of genital herpes lesions and the associated symptoms compared to three-day treatment with valacyclovir (500 mg capsule b.i.d).

primaryOutcome.measure: Investigator-assessed Time to Healing of All Non-aborted Genital Herpes Lesions
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 72 hours after initiation of study medication up to Day 20
